dji.sdk.api.GroundStation

Class DJIFollowMeInitializationInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.GroundStation.DJIFollowMeInitializationInfo

  • public class DJIFollowMeInitializationInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Follow Me Initialization Info Class

    The basic information used to initialize the follow me mission in navigation mode is present in this class. This class is a structure containing follow me mode(now, in 2.3.0 release only the default is available), the moving direction of following me.
    Version:
    V2.3.0
    Author:
    DJI Software

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationFollowMeMode followMeMode
      This will determine which kind of mode the follow me will act.
      double userLatitude
      The user latitude.
      double userLongitude
      The user longitude.
      DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationFollowMeYawMode yawMode
      This parameter will determine what kind of navigation mode the follow me will choose, such as point to customer and remote control.

        public DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationFollowMeMode followMeMode
